name: Birchian Flight Simulator
detailed_description: Welcome to an all-new revolutionary game where you get to be the pilot of a standard Birchian Aircraft! We are in the process of making this game the best game you will ever play!
about_the_game: Welcome to an all-new revolutionary game where you get to be the pilot of a standard Birchian Aircraft! We are in the process of making this game the best game you will ever play!
short_description: A simple flight simulator game that you will enjoy for ages and for all ages. Also made by a teenager (High Schooler).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i3 AMD Ryzen 3
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built in
  • Additional Notes: This is just a guess actual results may vary.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i5 AMD Ryzen 3
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built in
  • Additional Notes: This is just a guess actual results may vary.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.9 GHz (2015 MacBook Pro)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 6100 1536 MB (2015 MacBookPro)
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built in
  • Additional Notes: Will not be an optimal experience but will get you through the game (Hopefully)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.13.6
  • Processor: Something better than Intel Core i5 2.9 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Something better than Intel Iris Graphics 6100 1536 MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built in
  • Additional Notes: This is the computer the game was tested on and had fair gameplay.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
